name: Golden Olive Tapenade & Sea Salt Crisp Set
description: Elevate your next gathering with our Golden Olive Tapenade & Sea Salt Crisp Set. The hand-blended tapenade features sun-ripened olives, a hint of preserved lemon, and a drizzle of cold-pressed olive oil, delivering a rich and tangy Mediterranean flavor. Paired with crunchy, artisan-baked sea salt crisps, this set is perfect for entertaining or indulging in a savory snack. Ready to serve and beautifully packaged, it's a delightful gift or a treat for your own table.

attributes.packaging: Recyclable glass jar and paper box
